messages.title: Everyone Knows Labour Isn't Going to Win This Time
messages.content: "There is no realistic chance of us winning."

messages.title: ...But Voting Liberal Democrat This Time Will Get MPs Who Will Champion Your Local Schools, Health Services and Community.
messages.content: "The Liberal Democrats have pledged to reverse unfair school cuts, restore bursaries for nurses, and put a penny on income tax to provide an immediate £6bn for the NHS."

messages.title: More Conservative MPs Won't Stop Theresa May's NHS and School Cuts.
messages.content: "NHS cuts blamed for 30,000 deaths in new study" - The Independent, 17 Feb 2017. "Schools face the worst funding cuts in 20 years." - The Independent, 2 Mar 2017.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Reversing cuts to school funding and investing £6.9bn in schools and colleges.
Providing immediate injection of £6bn for the NHS, and reversing government cuts.

mentions.tacticalSituation: Everyone knows Labour isn't going to win this time.

issues.health: Providing immediate injection of £6bn for the NHS.

community.content: Champion your local schools, health services and community.

quotes.text: "We cannot fight and win under Jeremy as our leader"
"The Liberal Democrats have pledged to reverse unfair school cuts, restore bursaries for nurses, and put a penny on income tax to provide an immediate £6bn for the NHS."
